projects.title: Tsavvy
projects.description: I have developed an informational web application using ReactJS that integrates the Blogger API to dynamically manage content, allowing administrators to update posts without modifying code. I used Axios for HTTP requests, which ensures synchronization with Blogger posts, and React Router DOM for seamless navigation between pages such as the list of posts and details of each article. The application was built using Vite to take advantage of its performance and rapid development environment.

projects.title: HL Transporte
projects.description: I developed the website for HL Transporte, a tourism company, using ReactJS and Next.js. The page includes sections for services, destinations, clients and about us, as well as an integrated quote system that allows forms to be sent via WhatsApp. I contributed to improving the user experience and functionality of the site, optimizing its performance and usability

projects.title: Codear
projects.description: I developed Codear Marketing using ReactJS to offer an innovative and attractive presentation of services and mission, improving the user experience. I implemented React Router DOM for fluid navigation, React Helmet Async for metadata management and SEO, and React Transition Group to create smooth transitions between the different sections of the website. This allows for a dynamic interface, optimized for digital marketing and aimed at improving brand visibility and presentation.

projects.title: Buenos Amigos
projects.description: I have developed a project for a coffee shop using ReactJS, which allows to display the stock of drinks through an integration with a Rest API. I implemented Axios to make requests to the API, React Router DOM to manage navigation between pages, and React Helmet to optimize SEO and manage metadata. In addition, Bootstrap was used for responsive design and an attractive interface, providing an intuitive and modern user experience.

projects.title: SafePaws
projects.description: The adoption web was built using ReactJS for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend.

projects.title: Motorclycle
projects.description: The online store was built using ReactJS for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend.

projects.title: Rentsale
projects.description: I developed a web application for a real estate agency using ReactJS on the frontend, allowing for efficient property management. The application uses Axios to make API requests and React Router DOM for seamless navigation between sections. I incorporated React Helmet and React Helmet Async for improved SEO and metadata management, while React Hook Form facilitates form validation and management. I also included React Hot Toast for engaging notifications, React Select for selecting properties, and React Slick along with Slick Carousel to implement a responsive carousel, offering an intuitive and modern user experience.
